title: and #PumpRules Super Fan Emma Tillinger Koskoff
description:
Three-time Oscar nominated producer Emma Tillinger Koskoff is the surprise guest, and shares what it was like to have two “Best Picture” nominations last year (for “The Irishman” and “Joker”), and why it’s the cast of #PumpRules that gets her so starstruck! Plus, Randall’s mom checks in from Miami, and Lala has a baby update, talks bump shaming, and answers more of your voicemails!

And if you have something to share with Lala and Rand, call them! 1-866-LALA-POD

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
